info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-msdp-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG
     definitions for Multicast Source Discovery Protocol Operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2022-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 9

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-msdp-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-msdp-oper.yang)

get.description: Multicast Source Discovery Protocol Operational data
Non key entries for MSDP Peer table data (collection)
Non key entries for MSDP Peer table data
Non key entries for MSDP SA Cache data (collection)
Non key entries for MSDP SA Cache data
Non key entries for MSDP Peer table data (collection)
Non key entries for MSDP Peer table data
Non key entries for MSDP SA Cache data (collection)
Non key entries for MSDP SA Cache data

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

acl-name.description: The name of the ACL which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

routemap-name.description: The name of the Route-map which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

filter.description: All incoming MSDP Source Active messages are filtered out if this is turned on

as.description: The Autonomous System where the peer address resides on

upsince.description: The Absolute time since the peer has been up

sa-count.description: Count of SA learned from this peer

address-namestring.description: DNS hostname given for an IP address

peer-descr.description: Human readable description given to a peer

connect-src-if-name.description: Source interface used for establishing the MSDP connection

connect-src-addr.description: Source IP address used for establishing the MSDP connection

in-count.description: Number of messages received from peer

out-count.description: Number of messages sent to peer

safilter-rp-in.description: Access list to filter the incoming MSDP SA messages from a specific RP

routemap-rp-in.description: Route map to filter the incoming MSDP SA messages from a specific RP

safilter-rp-out.description: Access list to filter the outgoing MSDP SA messages from a specific RP

routemap-rp-out.description: Route map to filter the outgoing MSDP SA messages from a specific RP

sa-limit.description: Maximum number of SA cache entries allowed to learn from this peer

estb-trans-count.description: Number of MSDP state transitions to established state

inputq-count.description: The number of packets in input queue

outputq-count.description: The number of packets in output queue

password-enabled.description: Is MD5 password enabled or not for the peer

rpf-failures.description: The number of SA messages received from this peer that failed the Peer RPF check

in-sas.description: The number of MSDP SA messages received from this peer

out-sas.description: The number of MSDP SA messages sent to this peer

in-data-pkts.description: The total number of encapsulated data packets received from this peer

out-data-pkts.description: The total number of encapsulated data packets sent to this peer

estb-trans-time.description:
This timestamp is set to the value of system uptime when a peer
         transitions into or out of the ESTABLISHED state. It is set to
         zero when the MSDP speaker is booted

peer-local-address.description: The local IP address of the peer used for the MSDP connection

peer-connect-retry-intvl.description: Interval that the MSDP peers wait before re-trying the connection

peer-hold-time.description: Interval that the MSDP peer waits for keepalive messages before declaring the session as down

keepalive-period.description: Interval at which the MSDP peer sends keepalive messages

peer-remote-port.description: The remote port for the TCP connection between the MSDP peers

peer-local-port.description: The local port for the TCP connection between the MSDP peers

connection-attempts.description: The number of TCP connection attempts

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

acl-name.description: The name of the ACL which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

routemap-name.description: The name of the Route-map which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

filter.description: All incoming MSDP Source Active messages are filtered out if this is turned on

in-filter.description: Source Active filter to filter a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

acl-name.description: The name of the ACL which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

routemap-name.description: The name of the Route-map which filters a particular (S, G) state information in the incoming MSDP Source Active messages

enabled.description: Peer filtering is enabled and all the incoming SA messages received from the peer are filtered out

filter.description: All incoming MSDP Source Active messages are filtered out if this is turned on

out-filter.description: Source Active filter to filter a particular (S, G) state information in the outgoing MSDP Source Active messages

vrf.description: MSDP VRF name, if it is default vrf use 'IPv4 default'

expires.description: The Time till the peer expires

peer.description: The peer from which this SA Cache entry was created

num-in-sas.description: The Number of SA messages relevant to this cache entry

num-in-data-pkts.description: The Number of data packets received, relevant to this cache entry

rpf-peer.description: The peer from which an SA message corresponding to this cache entry would be accepted

grp-addr.description: The group address of the SA Cache entry

src-addr.description: The source address of the SA Cache entry

rp-addr.description: The Rendezvous Point of the SA Cache entry
